#summary Steps to exploit MultiVeStA.

= Using MultiVeStA overall vision=

In the following there is a summary of the steps needed to use MultiVeStA:

  * Download the latest version of Multivesta from the [download page]
  * If your simulator is not currently supported (check the list in the [http://code.google.com/p/multivesta/ home page]) [http://code.google.com/p/multivesta/wiki/ExtendMultiVeStA extend MultiVeStA] to support it
  * [http://code.google.com/p/multivesta/wiki/LinkYourModel Link your model to MultiVeStA]
  * Define [http://code.google.com/p/multivesta/wiki/MultiQuaTEx MultiQuaTEx expression]
  * Launch MultiVeStA servers, then configure and launch the [http://code.google.com/p/multivesta/wiki/MultiVeStAclient client]
